name: HEX (itch) (Nicho_wolfen)
description:
Hex is a endless obstacle-avoiding arcade game. 

Try to get the highest score and collect as many runes as you can,  

while avoiding getting squished by any falling walls!

Controls: 

A / Left Arrow        >        Go left

A / Right Arrow        >        Go right

 Mouse & touch screen functionality

All art, music and code made by me.

Hex is the first game I've ever made, hope you like it!
